content:
To everyone in Madrid: L
et's have a meetup this week. Who's here during lunch tomorrow (Sunday)? @James Agnew would like to join, and he leaves on Sunday. Don't want to pull him out of his holiday ;-)
@Patrick Werner , @Simone Heckmann ?
Sorry @Oliver Krauss , @James Agnew . Not gonna make lunch today. How about Monday lunch? James, I know you aren't able to make that, we'll talk offline and I'll take your input
Sorry I got the Education Facilitators Luncheon on Monday. Could we do Today right after Q4 or Tuesday Lunch?
Or actually this break between Q1 and Q2 would work
@Marten Smits unfortunately i'm not in Madrid.
Tuesday lunch is good for me! This break as well!

Hi, um sorry, I guess "this" break is gone... :)
Today after Q4 could work though...
it currently is breaktime. But I still didn't prepare the presentation for the track :D
